hero.title: UnhasDaMah
hero.subtitle: Your beauty space for perfect nails

about.title: About Me
about.description: Hello, I'm Mah and I'm a nail design specialist. With over 5 years of experience, I offer high-quality services to make your nails beautiful and healthy.

manicure.title: Manicure and Pedicure
manicure.description: Complete treatment for your hand and foot nails, including cuticle removal, filing, polishing and painting.

gel.title: Gel Extension on Tips
gel.description: Nail extension using tips and gel to create long-lasting and natural-looking nails.

russian.title: Russian Method
russian.description: Advanced extension technique that creates elegant and resistant nails using the Russian method.

location.title: Location
location.address: Rua Rubim César, 653 - Vila São Jorge, São Vicente - São Paulo
